title: BUSWAYS, INCLUDING RISING MAINS SYSTEMS
fullText:
Busbar trunking systems (busways) shall comply with AS/NZS 3439.2 or AS/NZS 61439.6, and shall be installed in accordance with the manufacturer's instructions.
Where used as a wiring system, the installation shall be in accordance with the relevant requirements of Clause 3.9.
NOTE: See Clause 3.9.9.3 for requirements for penetration of fire-rated constructions.
